trans-unit.source: The final stage of this tutorial is to build and run your new app.
trans-unit.target: The final stage of this tutorial is to build and run your new app.

trans-unit.source: Browse to the location where you saved the compressed project files and expand the files on your computer into your Android Studio projects directory.
trans-unit.target: Browse to the location where you saved the compressed project files and expand the files on your computer into your Android Studio projects directory.

trans-unit.source: Open Android Studio.
trans-unit.target: Open Android Studio.

trans-unit.source: If you are working with a project and it appears, close the project (File => Close Project).
trans-unit.target: If you are working with a project and it appears, close the project (File => Close Project).

trans-unit.source: Select Open an existing Android Studio project, browse to the project location, and then click OK.
trans-unit.target: Select Open an existing Android Studio project, browse to the project location, and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: In the left Project Explorer window, ensure that the Project tab is selected, then open app, src, java and double click on ToDoactivity,
trans-unit.target: In the left Project Explorer window, ensure that the Project tab is selected, then open app, src, java and double click on ToDoactivity,

trans-unit.source: If you downloaded version 2.0 of the SDK, you need to update the code with the Url and key of your mobile service:
trans-unit.target: If you downloaded version 2.0 of the SDK, you need to update the code with the Url and key of your mobile service:

trans-unit.source: Find the OnCreate method in TodoActivity.java and locate the code that instantiates the mobile services client.
trans-unit.target: Find the OnCreate method in TodoActivity.java and locate the code that instantiates the mobile services client.

trans-unit.source: The code is visible in the preceding image.
trans-unit.target: The code is visible in the preceding image.

trans-unit.source: Replace "MobileServiceUrl" with the actual Url of your mobile service.
trans-unit.target: Replace "MobileServiceUrl" with the actual Url of your mobile service.

trans-unit.source: Replace "AppKey" with the key of your mobile service.
trans-unit.target: Replace "AppKey" with the key of your mobile service.

trans-unit.source: For more details consult the tutorial <link><linkText>Add Mobile Services to an existing app</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more details consult the tutorial <link><linkText>Add Mobile Services to an existing app</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: From the Run menu, click Run to start the project in the Android emulator.
trans-unit.target: From the Run menu, click Run to start the project in the Android emulator.

trans-unit.source: To be able to run the project in the Android emulator, you must define a least one Android Virtual Device (AVD).
trans-unit.target: To be able to run the project in the Android emulator, you must define a least one Android Virtual Device (AVD).

trans-unit.source: Use the AVD Manager to create and manage these devices.
trans-unit.target: Use the AVD Manager to create and manage these devices.

trans-unit.source: In the app, type meaningful text, such as _Complete the tutorial_, and then click Add.
trans-unit.target: In the app, type meaningful text, such as _Complete the tutorial_, and then click Add.

trans-unit.source: This sends a POST request to the new mobile service hosted in Azure.
trans-unit.target: This sends a POST request to the new mobile service hosted in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Data from the request is inserted into the TodoItem table.
trans-unit.target: Data from the request is inserted into the TodoItem table.

trans-unit.source: Items stored in the table are returned by the mobile service, and the data is displayed in the list.
trans-unit.target: Items stored in the table are returned by the mobile service, and the data is displayed in the list.

trans-unit.source: You can review the code that accesses your mobile service to query and insert data, which is found in the ToDoActivity.java file.
trans-unit.target: You can review the code that accesses your mobile service to query and insert data, which is found in the ToDoActivity.java file.

trans-unit.source: Back in the Management Portal, click the Data tab and then click the TodoItems table.
trans-unit.target: Back in the Management Portal, click the Data tab and then click the TodoItems table.

trans-unit.source: This lets you browse the data inserted by the app into the table.
trans-unit.target: This lets you browse the data inserted by the app into the table.
